## Iana.Converters.datedRegistry() function

Helper function which creates a converter that returns a validated [DatedRegistry](./ts-bcp47.iana.model.idatedregistry.md) containing entries of supplied template type `T`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function datedRegistry<T, TC = unknown>(entryConverter: Converter<T, TC>): Converter<IDatedRegistry<T>, TC>;
```

entryConverter


</td><td>

Converter&lt;T, TC&gt;


</td><td>

A `Converter<T>` to validate each entry


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Converter&lt;IDatedRegistry&lt;T&gt;, TC&gt;

A new validating `Converter` which yields [DatedRegistry&lt;T&gt;](./ts-bcp47.iana.model.idatedregistry.md)
